Radio Tower Rooftop.Body: You find yourself next to an old radio dish. It looks like it can still turn.

Choices.Text: Climb down to the Discarded Apartment.

Discarded Apartment.Body: Dusty floors and broken furniture. A stairwell leads up, and a hallway south. A Market can be seen, to dark to tell what's inside.

Choices.Text: Go up to the Radio Tower Rooftop.
Walk south to the Flooded Alley.
Try to enter the Abandoned Market (Use Flashlight).

Flooded Alley.Body: Shallow water floods the path. There's a tunnel ahead and a way back.

Choices.Text: Go east to the Sewage Tunnel.
Go west to the Discarded Apartment.

Sewage Tunnel.Body: Dark, damp, and echoing. You hope nothing lives here. Something metallic glints in the muck.

Abandoned Market.Body: Old cans and broken displays. A crate sits near the back.

Choices.Text: Pick up the crate to reach higher places.
Use crate to climb to Roof Garden.
Go down to the Boat Launch Site.

Roof Garden.Body: Overgrown greenery and rusted tools. A crowbar is jammed into an old planter.

Choices.Text: Go back down to the Abandoned Market.

Boat Launch Site.Body: Creaking docks and stagnant water. A road curves away.

Choices.Text: Walk east to the Overpass Ruins.

Overpass Ruins.Body: Collapsed roads and twisted metal frame the skyline. A massive iron door blocks the library below.

Choices.Text: Use crowbar to open the library door.
Return to the Boat Launch Site.

Sunken Library.Body: You pry open the heavy door and step into the Sunken Library. Books float in ankle-deep water. On a pedestal, an ancient text glows faintly.

Choices.Text: Take the ancient text and end your journey.
